trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration section that contains a list of behaviors that is applied to all [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services on the machine before the behaviors in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_behaviors" name="behaviors" href=""></xref> section are applied.
This configuration section is defined in the Machine.config file.
It contains a list of behaviors that is applied to all [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services on the machine before the behaviors in the `behaviors` section are applied.
If a behavior is defined in both sections, the behavior in the `behaviors` sections is given preference.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.CommonBehaviorsSection"></xref> class.
Gets all the child entries that are <xref uid="langword_csharp_EndpointBehavior" name="EndpointBehavior" href=""></xref> elements identified by their unique name.
The child entries that are <xref uid="langword_csharp_EndpointBehavior" name="EndpointBehavior" href=""></xref> elements identified by their unique name.

Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.

A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
Gets all the child entries that are <xref uid="langword_csharp_serviceBehavior" name="serviceBehavior" href=""></xref> elements identified by their unique name.
The child entries that are <xref uid="langword_csharp_serviceBehavior" name="serviceBehavior" href=""></xref> elements identified by their unique name.
